content: lion brand pattern # 80459ad skill level easy level 2 vanna s glamour® article #861 1 ball shown in sapphire crochet hook - size f-5 3 75 mm one button 7/8 in 22 mm diameter clutch is worked in single_crochet with lace section for the folded top some sewing required to finish also available at joann com p010050 enchanting crochet clutch 1 similar pattern 81056ad evening glitter clutch 2 works up to a slightly different size using 2 strands of yarn throughout 1 http //www joann com/enchanting-crochet-clutch/p010050 html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/evening-glitter-clutch
